title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Inclusive Mathematics Education for Students with Disabilities: COIL-Based Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three math learning barriers for students with disabilities and propose solutions using Collaborative Online International Learning (COIL).
Learners can develop at least two customized math learning materials for different types of disabilities using an ODL (Open and Distance Learning) platform.

Learners form international project teams (4 members per team) using PBL (Problem-Based Learning) and write a 20-page report applying inclusive education design principles (UDL 3 principles, cultural diversity considerations) within a six-month course. They achieve an average score of 4 or higher on peer and instructor evaluations (5-point scale).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
